pageContent: Purpose/objectives: To describe the percentages of men with and without changes in sexual function from the beginning to end of radiation therapy and evaluate for differences in demographic and clinical characteristics, mood states, and quality of life (QOL) among patients who did and did not experience changes in sexual function.

metaData.source:
Complications and postoperative events after cryosurgery for prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/21883827/
